verses.verse: Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> advanced <S%H935><s%> in age; <S%H3117><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> way. <S%H3605><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5650><s%> the oldest <S%H2205><s%> of his household, <S%H1004><s%> who had <S%H4910><s%> charge <S%H4910><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that he owned, "Please <S%H4994><s%> place <S%H7760><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my thigh, <S%H3409><s%>

and I will make you swear <S%H7650><s%> by the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of earth, <S%H776><s%> that you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I live, <S%H3427><s%>
but you shall go <S%H1980><s%> to my country <S%H776><s%> and to my relatives, <S%H4138><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%> "

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Suppose <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> will not be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> me to this <S%H2088><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> should I take <S%H7725><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> from where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you came <S%H3318><s%>?"
Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Beware <S%H8104><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you take <S%H7725><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> there! <S%H8033><s%>

"The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who <S%H834><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> me from my father's house <S%H1004><s%> and from the land <S%H776><s%> of my birth, <S%H4138><s%> and who <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, and who <S%H834><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'To your descendants <S%H2233><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%>' He will send <S%H7971><s%> His angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you will take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> from there. <S%H8033><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> is not willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> you, then you will be free <S%H5352><s%> from this <S%H2088><s%> my oath; <S%H7621><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> do not take <S%H7725><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>"

So the servant <S%H5650><s%> placed <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the thigh <S%H3409><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his master, <S%H113><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> to him concerning <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> matter. <S%H1697><s%>

Then the servant <S%H5650><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> from the camels <S%H1581><s%> of his master, <S%H113><s%> and set <S%H1980><s%> out with a variety <S%H3605><s%> of good <S%H2898><s%> things <S%H2898><s%> of his master's in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

And he made the camels <S%H1581><s%> kneel <S%H1288><s%> down <S%H1288><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by the well <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> when women go <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water. <S%H7579><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> grant <S%H7136><s%> me success <S%H7136><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am standing <S%H5324><s%> by the spring, <S%H9407><s%> and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> are coming <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%>

now may it be that the girl <S%H5291><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> 'Please <S%H4994><s%> let <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> your jar <S%H3537><s%> so that I may drink, <S%H8354><s%>' and who answers, <S%H559><s%> 'Drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will water <S%H8248><s%> your camels <S%H1581><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>'; â€“ [may] she [be the one] whom Thou hast appointed <S%H3198><s%> for Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and by this I shall know <S%H3045><s%> that Thou hast shown <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to my master. <S%H113><s%> "

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about before <S%H2962><s%> he had finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking, <S%H1696><s%> that behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Abraham's brother <S%H251><s%> Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out with her jar <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

And the girl <S%H5291><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> beautiful, <S%H2896><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> had had <S%H3045><s%> relations <S%H3045><s%> with her; and she went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the spring <S%H9407><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> her jar, <S%H3537><s%> and came <S%H5927><s%> up.

Then the servant <S%H5650><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let me drink <S%H1572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from your jar. <S%H3537><s%>"

And she said, <S%H559><s%> "Drink, <S%H8354><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%>"; and she quickly <S%H4116><s%> lowered <S%H3381><s%> her jar <S%H3537><s%> to her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and gave <S%H8248><s%> him a drink. <S%H8248><s%>

Now when she had finished <S%H3615><s%> giving <S%H8248><s%> him a drink, <S%H8248><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> "I will draw <S%H7579><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> for your camels <S%H1581><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H518><s%> they have finished <S%H3615><s%> drinking. <S%H8354><s%>"

So she quickly <S%H4116><s%> emptied <S%H6168><s%> her jar <S%H3537><s%> into the trough, <S%H8268><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> back <S%H5750><s%> to the well <S%H875><s%> to draw, <S%H7579><s%> and she drew <S%H7579><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his camels. <S%H1581><s%>

Meanwhile, the man <S%H376><s%> was gazing <S%H7583><s%> at her in silence, <S%H2790><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> whether the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6743><s%> his journey <S%H1870><s%> successful <S%H6743><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not.

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H9201><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> drinking, <S%H8354><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> ring <S%H5141><s%> weighing <S%H4948><s%> a half-shekel and two <S%H8147><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> for her wrists <S%H3027><s%> weighing <S%H4948><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels in gold, <S%H2091><s%>

and said, <S%H559><s%> "Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> are you? Please <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, is there <S%H3426><s%> room <S%H4725><s%> for us to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in your father's house <S%H1004><s%>?"

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I am the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>"
Again she said <S%H559><s%> to him, "We have plenty <S%H7227><s%> of both <S%H1571><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and feed, <S%H4554><s%> and room <S%H4725><s%> to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in."
Then the man <S%H376><s%> bowed <S%H6915><s%> low <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and His truth <S%H571><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> my master; <S%H113><s%> as for me, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has guided <S%H5148><s%> me in the way <S%H1870><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of my master's brothers. <S%H251><s%>"
Then the girl <S%H5291><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her mother's household <S%H1004><s%> about these <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>

Now Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> had a brother <S%H251><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Laban; <S%H3837><s%> and Laban <S%H3837><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> at the spring. <S%H9407><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about that when he saw <S%H7200><s%> the ring, <S%H5141><s%> and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on his sister <S%H269><s%>'s wrists, <S%H3027><s%> and when he heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his sister, saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H3541><s%> is what <S%H3541><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to me," he went <S%H935><s%> to the man; <S%H376><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was standing <S%H5975><s%> by the camels <S%H1581><s%> at the spring. <S%H9407><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Come <S%H935><s%> in, blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord! <S%H3068><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> do you stand <S%H5975><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> since I have prepared <S%H6437><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> and a place <S%H4725><s%> for the camels <S%H1581><s%>?"

So the man <S%H376><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%> Then Laban unloaded <S%H6605><s%> the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and feed <S%H4554><s%> to the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him.

But when [food] was set <S%H7760><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him to eat, <S%H398><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "I will not eat <S%H398><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H518><s%> I have told <S%H1696><s%> my business. <S%H1697><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Speak <S%H1696><s%> on."
So he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am Abraham's servant. <S%H5650><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has greatly <S%H3966><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> my master, <S%H113><s%> so that he has become <S%H1431><s%> rich; <S%H1431><s%> and He has given <S%H5414><s%> him flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> and servants <S%H5650><s%> and maids, <S%H8198><s%> and camels <S%H1581><s%> and donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>

"Now Sarah <S%H8283><s%> my master <S%H113><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to my master in her old <S%H2209><s%> age; <S%H2209><s%> and he has given <S%H5414><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> that he has.

"And my master <S%H113><s%> made me swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> I live; <S%H3427><s%>
but you shall go <S%H1980><s%> to my father's house, <S%H1004><s%> and to my relatives, <S%H4940><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son. <S%H1121><s%>'
"And I said <S%H559><s%> to my master, <S%H113><s%> 'Suppose <S%H194><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> does not follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> me.'

"And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have walked, <S%H1980><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> His angel <S%H4397><s%> with you to make your journey <S%H1870><s%> successful, <S%H6743><s%> and you will take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> from my relatives, <S%H4940><s%> and from my father's house; <S%H1004><s%>

then <S%H227><s%> you will be free <S%H5352><s%> from my oath, <S%H423><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> to my relatives; <S%H4940><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> they do not give <S%H5414><s%> her to you, you will be free <S%H9345><s%> from my oath. <S%H423><s%>'

"So I came <S%H935><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> to the spring, <S%H9407><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> 'O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> if <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> Thou wilt make my journey <S%H1870><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> I go <S%H1980><s%> successful; <S%H6743><s%>

behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am standing <S%H5324><s%> by the spring, <S%H9407><s%> and may it be that the maiden <S%H5959><s%> who comes <S%H3318><s%> out to draw, <S%H7579><s%> and to whom I say, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let me drink <S%H8248><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from your jar <S%H3537><s%>";

and she will say <S%H559><s%> to me, "You drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will draw <S%H7579><s%> for your camels <S%H1581><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>"; let her be the woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has appointed <S%H3198><s%> for my master's son. <S%H1121><s%> '

"Before <S%H2962><s%> I had finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out with her jar <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the spring <S%H9407><s%> and drew; <S%H7579><s%> and I said <S%H559><s%> to her, 'Please <S%H4994><s%> let me drink. <S%H8248><s%>'

"And she quickly <S%H4116><s%> lowered <S%H3381><s%> her jar <S%H3537><s%> from her [shoulder,] and said, <S%H559><s%> 'Drink, <S%H8354><s%> and I will water <S%H8248><s%> your camels <S%H1581><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>'; so I drank, <S%H8354><s%> and she watered <S%H8248><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

"Then I asked <S%H7592><s%> her, and said, <S%H559><s%> 'Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> are you?' And she said, <S%H559><s%> 'The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> Nahor's son, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him'; and I put <S%H7760><s%> the ring <S%H5141><s%> on her nose, <S%H639><s%> and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on her wrists. <S%H3027><s%>

"And I bowed <S%H6915><s%> low <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had guided <S%H5148><s%> me in the right <S%H571><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my master's kinsman <S%H251><s%> for his son. <S%H1121><s%>

"So now <S%H6258><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you are going <S%H3426><s%> to deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with my master, <S%H113><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me; and if <S%H518><s%> not, let me know, <S%H5046><s%> that I may turn <S%H6437><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the left. <S%H8040><s%>"

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> and Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "The matter <S%H1697><s%> comes <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> [so] we cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to you bad <S%H7451><s%> or <S%H176><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you, take <S%H3947><s%> [her] and go, <S%H1980><s%> and let her be the wife <S%H802><s%> of your master's son, <S%H1121><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> Abraham's servant <S%H5650><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> their words, <S%H1697><s%> that he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself to the ground <S%H776><s%> before the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> out articles <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and articles <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and garments, <S%H899><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Rebekah; <S%H7259><s%> he also gave <S%H5414><s%> precious <S%H4030><s%> things <S%H4030><s%> to her brother <S%H251><s%> and to her mother. <S%H517><s%>
